content: Only bought it to support the devs. Great game! Perhaps making the non paid version have an ad removal option. I'm up to level 1000 with ads, now I have to start over.
replyContent:
Thank you Ben!
It's possible to transfer your progress across free and paid versions. To achieve this, you need to login into game services - please find a joystick button on the main menu. First login in the free version, then on paid one. Once you are logged in - the progress will be stored on your Google Drive, so you can continue on any device.

content: I decided to purchase the payed version because of the funny new face masks lol... So it turns out that I only need to play this version for 20 minutes for the face masks to appear. I'm glad, I am really loving those funny face masks, especially when they come off once the same coloured guys are settled together, it's so funny!

I love this game! I have been stuck several times, but I have always eventually been able to clear each level eventually. However, level 4 (hard) - 1795 has me super-stumped! I bought the paid version for the hints, but I don't see the hints.....just the sparkles to take me back a bit. Can someone, anyone please help me get past this level! I am beginning to think it is impossible.... HELP!
replyContent:
Hello Virginia. 
The sparkles are hints! They appear only when you are came into unsolvable state (when it's not possible to solve anymore, no matter what moves you do). That said, while you see no sparkles - you are good, and doing all right!

replyContent: 20 minutes IN the game. Please keep playing.

content: Refund my amount please
replyContent: To get refund, please follow instructions: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2479637?hl=en

content: Great game! Very addictive. ( I wish all levels had the option to turn off hints.)
I was updating to the paid version and was confused when the #StayHome wasn't available as I have gotten used to it on the free version.
replyContent:
They appear after 20 minutes in the game.
I did such delay to not confuse new players with such design, as in the beginning that was just a joke, or an "easter egg". But now, many players seems to take them as a native design. ;)

content: Great game well designed, bought it to enjoy ad free üôÇ
I love the new mask mode!
I am addicted. The first modes of difficulty are very easy but the two last ones are good. 3000 levels for each difficulty, so enough to be busy for a while :D

Fantastic fun puzzle. I love sorting and this is just perfect for my down times. I really like the COVID-19 masks! I contacted the developer when I got the upgrade and the masks weren't on it. I got a quick reply that the masks turn on after 20 minutes of game play which was exactly what happened. Very pleased with this game.
I was loving this game so I paid for the upgrade. It seems to install a new version on your phone so completely lost all my progress. So frustrating!!
replyContent:
The game progress can be transferred across paid and free versions!
To do so, please login into game services in both versions (use joystick button in the main menu).

content: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE!!!
Love it!
Great fun and a bit of brain training thrown in.
Addictive as hell!!! Lose hours playing this game!
In my Top 5 killing time phone games for the past 3 years.

LOVE THIS GAME!! The multiple levels keeps things interesting for sure. The only reason for not 5 stars is the super SUPER crazy levels should have real hints not just a roll back I've tried an tried an ive yet to solve even the 1st puzzle in crazy mode. Either way its a great time killer.
Great game . One problem, I see players on the leader bored with scores of 3000 and higher on level 4 . 3000 is the furthest l can go how do I get to 3001 ? OK and thank you for the quick response.
replyContent: To get maximum score, you need to solve first 50 levels with 3 stars, and other levels with hints disabled.

content: Easy, difficult, challenging, makes you think and find your strategy in every move. Many levels - so don't worry about completing too soon. I enjoy when there are holidays and some of the colors change into the current holiday theme. Maybe one day they'll make a birthday one for us. Great game... Thank you for creating it! PS. still waiting for the iPad version üòâ
great for brain exersize!
hints are not available. I want hints also. it is not possible to solve after level 100. how can I get the hints.
replyContent:
If you are talking about public levelpacks (easy-hard), then hints are flying sparkles, appear once you get into unsolvable state. 'Undo' button returns you into last solvable position then.
But if you are talking about hidden "Crazy" levelpack (the green one), then true, this levelpack is special one, for experts. It contains no hints.

content: im stuck with 5-372 hints are not available
This game is totally awesome
3* for missing hint button.
replyContent: Hint-button is a button with light-bulb, appears on levels above 50 (not available neither in the free version nor on Crazy levelpack).

content: I love this Game
A fun game to pass the time with.
Bought it for the hints but can't access those. Apart from that it's addictive and fun
replyContent:
Probably I need to explain about hints.
First of all, hints - are flying sparkles (and sound "o-oh"), occur when player gets into unsolvable state (only "undo" button helps you get to last solvable state)
Also, hints are always enabled on first 50 levels. 
And of more: there are no hints at all on Crazy levelpack (green one).

content: Why no hints in level 5
replyContent: Levelpack 5 (Crazy) is a special one. First of all, it's not available from the beginning, and gets unlocked for excellent players only. Secondly, many players wanted challenging levels, extra hard. Therefore I introduced this one.

content: Superb Game ! Good Job Developers ! The tuffest levels don't have hints..im stuck mid way :( ... Pleaseee include hints for the newly added tuffest levels .. It wud b of great help ! Cheers !

However do hints not exist on the harder levels? I bought the game for the hints because I am stuck but it seems that hints are only available on the first three difficulties. This is useless to me because I play the hardest two difficulties üòíüòìüò†
replyContent: Ah, sorry for confusion. But you are right - hints are available only on easy, normal and hard levels. The new "crazy" in fact is a "hidden" one - it appears as a bonus for excellent solvers of hard level. This one was introduced as response to players who wanted an extra-hard.

content: I Rated It In It's Free Version. Bought it To Support The Developer
I wish it saved my progress from the free version. Maybe fix and I'll rate the game better.
replyContent:
If you login into game services in both versions (free and paid), then the progress will be transferred across games.
 Feel free to write to support@lyfoes.com if you still have any problems.

content: Fun, kid-friendly, levels for everybody, and lots of content.
